name: -webkit-box-lines
description: Specifies whether a flexible box should contain multiple lines of content.
longDescription: This property applies only to flexible box layouts. For more information about flexible boxes, see http://www.w3.org/TR/css3-layout/.

<behavior>.description: If multiple, the flexible box can contain multiple lines of content; if single, only one line is allowed.

values.multiple: The box can contain multiple lines of content.
values.single: The box can contain only one line of content.
